extension.name: Yj Piecemaker
extension.author: YouJoomla.com
extension.description: Youjoomla Piecemaker Module for Joomla 1.5x

field.name: module_template
field.label: Select default module template
field.description: You can create custom module templates for YJ Piecemaker Simply copy modules/mod_yj_piecemaker/tmpl/Default folder , rename it to your own template name and edit default.php within your template folder to your liking. Once you have created your module template , your template name will be visible here. You can also copy your template folder to your template/html/mod_yj_piecemaker/ folder and create custom overides for each module instance. To get you started we have created blank module template name New

field.name: width
field.label: Slide width
field.description: Slide width

field.name: height
field.label: Slide height
field.description: Slide height should be the image or media height

field.name: MenuDistanceY
field.label: MenuDistanceY
field.description: Distance of the menu from the bottom of the image.NOTE: Lowest values should be 10 for best performance.

field.name: MenuDistanceX
field.label: MenuDistanceX
field.description: Distance between two menu items (from center to center)

field.name: DropShadowDistance
field.label: Shaodow height
field.description: Shaodow height from slide bottom edge.

field.name: order
field.label: Slides ordering
field.description: Slide ordering

field.name: Autoplay
field.label: Autoplay
field.description: Number of seconds from one transition to another, if not stopped. Set to 0 to disable autoplay

field.name: slide_type_1
field.label: Slide 1 Type
field.description: Select media type for Slide 1.

field.name: slide_autoplay_1
field.label: If video autoplay?
field.description: Start video after the transition.

field.name: slide_iprev_1
field.label: Slide1 preview image
field.description: This setting is to be used only if slide type is Video or Flash.

field.name: slide_media_1
field.label: Select Slide 1 media
field.description: Select slide 1 media from images/yj_piecemaker folder.

field.name: slide_title_1
field.label: Slide 1 Title
field.description: Slide 1 title

field.name: slide_desc_1
field.default:
This is your first slide info title

You can use p or h1 element tag to define your custom description
field.label: Slide 1 Description
field.description: Slide 1 description. If left empty it will not be displayed. Note: Not available for Videos or Flash media type.

field.name: slide_link_1
field.label: Slide 1 Link
field.description: Slide 1 Link.If left empty it will not be displayed. Note: Not available for Videos or Flash media type.

field.name: slide_linkt_1
field.label: Slide 1 link target
field.description: New window or self.

field.name: slide_Pieces_1
field.label: Pieces
field.description: Number of pieces to which the image is sliced

field.name: slide_Time_1
field.label: Time
field.description: Time for one cube to turn

field.name: slide_Transition_1
field.label: Transition
field.description: Transition type of the Tweener class.The best results are achieved by those transition types, which begin with easeInOut

field.name: slide_Delay_1
field.label: Delay
field.description: Delay between the start of one cube to the start of the next cube

field.name: slide_DepthOffset_1
field.label: DepthOffset
field.description: - The offset during transition on the z-axis. Value between 100 and 1000 are recommended.

field.name: slide_CubeDistance_1
field.label: CubeDistance
field.description: - The distance between the cubes during transition. Values between 5 and 50 are recommended.

field.name: slide_type_2
field.label: Slide 2 Type
field.description: Select media type for Slide 2.

field.name: slide_autoplay_2
field.label: If video autoplay?
field.description: Start video after the transition.

field.name: slide_iprev_2
field.label: Slide1 preview image
field.description: This setting is to be used only if slide type is Video or Flash.

field.name: slide_media_2
field.label: Select Slide 2 media
field.description: Select slide 1 media from images/yj_piecemaker folder.

field.name: slide_title_2
field.label: Slide 2 Title
field.description: Slide 2 title

field.name: slide_desc_2
field.default:
This is your second slide info title

You can use p or h1 element tag to define your custom description
field.label: Slide 1 Description
field.description: Slide 2 description. If left empty it will not be displayed. Note: Not available for Videos or Flash media type.

field.name: slide_link_2
field.label: Slide 2 Link
field.description: Slide 2 Link.If left empty it will not be displayed. Note: Not available for Videos or Flash media type.

field.name: slide_linkt_2
field.label: Slide 2 link target
field.description: New window or self.

field.label: Pieces
field.description: Number of pieces to which the image is sliced

field.name: slide_Time_2
field.label: Time

field.name: slide_Transition_2

field.description: Transition type of the Tweener class.The best results are achieved by those transition types, which begin with easeInOut

field.description: Delay between the start of one cube to the start of the next cube

field.name: slide_DepthOffset_2
field.label: DepthOffset
field.description: - The offset during transition on the z-axis. Value between 100 and 1000 are recommended.

field.name: slide_CubeDistance_2
field.label: CubeDistance
field.description: - The distance between the cubes during transition. Values between 5 and 50 are recommended.

field.name: moduleclass_sfx
field.label: Module Class Suffix
field.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

field.name: LoaderColor
field.label: LoaderColor
field.description: Color of the cubes before the first image appears, also the color of the back sides of the cube, which become visible at some transition types

field.name: InnerSideColor
field.label: InnerSideColor
field.description: Color of the inner sides of the cube when sliced

field.name: SideShadowAlpha
field.label: SideShadowAlpha
field.description: Sides get darker when moved away from the front. This is the degree of darkness - 0 == no change, 1 == 100% black

field.name: DropShadowAlpha
field.label: DropShadowAlpha
field.description: Alpha of the drop shadow - 0 == no shadow, 1 == opaque

field.name: DropShadowScale
field.label: DropShadowScale
field.description: As the shadow is blurred, it appears wider that the actual image, when not resized. Thus its a good idea to make it slightly smaller. - 1 would be no resizing at all.

field.name: DropShadowBlurX
field.label: DropShadowBlurX
field.description: Blur of the drop shadow on the x-axis

field.name: DropShadowBlurY
field.label: DropShadowBlurY
field.description: Blur of the drop shadow on the y-axis

field.name: MenuColor1
field.label: MenuColor1
field.description: Color of an inactive menu item

field.name: MenuColor2
field.label: MenuColor2
field.description: Color of an active menu item

field.name: MenuColor3
field.label: MenuColor3
field.description: Color of the inner circle of an active menu item. Should equal the background color of the whole thing

field.name: ControlSize
field.label: ControlSize
field.description: Size of the controls, which appear on rollover (play, stop, info, link)

field.name: ControlDistance
field.label: ControlDistance
field.description: Distance between the controls (from the borders)

field.name: ControlColor1
field.label: ControlColor1
field.description: Background color of the controls

field.name: ControlColor2
field.label: ControlColor2
field.description: Font color of the controls

field.name: ControlAlpha
field.label: ControlAlpha
field.description: Alpha of a control, when mouse is not over

field.name: ControlAlphaOver
field.label: ControlAlphaOver
field.description: Alpha of a control, when mouse is over

field.name: ControlsX
field.label: ControlsX
field.description: X-position of the point, which aligns the controls (measured from [0,0] of the image)

field.name: ControlsY
field.label: ControlsY
field.description: Y-position of the point, which aligns the controls (measured from [0,0] of the image)

field.name: ControlsAlign
field.label: ControlsAlign
field.description: Type of alignment from the point [controlsX, controlsY] - can be center,left or right

field.name: TooltipHeight
field.label: TooltipHeight
field.description: Height of the tooltip surface in the menu

field.name: TooltipColor
field.label: TooltipColor
field.description: Color of the tooltip surface in the menu

field.name: TooltipTextY
field.label: TooltipTextY
field.description: Y-distance of the tooltip text field from the top of the tooltip

field.name: TooltipTextStyle
field.label: TooltipTextStyle
field.description: The style of the tooltip text, specified in the modulel/mod_yj_piecemaker/css/piecemaker.css CSS file

field.name: TooltipTextColor
field.label: TooltipTextColor
field.description: Color of the tooltip text

field.name: TooltipMarginLeft
field.label: TooltipMarginLeft
field.description: Margin of the text to the left end of the tooltip

field.name: TooltipMarginRight
field.label: TooltipMarginRight
field.description: Margin of the text to the right end of the tooltip

field.name: TooltipTextSharpness
field.label: TooltipTextSharpness
field.description: Sharpness of the tooltip text (-400 to 400)

field.name: TooltipTextThickness
field.label: TooltipTextThickness
field.description: Thickness of the tooltip text (-400 to 400)

field.name: InfoWidth
field.label: InfoWidth
field.description: The width of the info text field

field.name: InfoBackground
field.label: InfoBackground
field.description: The background color of the info text field

field.name: InfoBackgroundAlpha
field.label: InfoBackgroundAlpha
field.description: The alpha of the background of the info text, the image shines through, when smaller than 1

field.name: InfoMargin
field.label: InfoMargin
field.description: The margin of the text field in the info section to all sides InfoSharpness =

field.name: InfoSharpness
field.label: InfoSharpness
field.description: Sharpness of the info text

field.name: InfoThickness
field.label: InfoThickness
field.description: Thickness of the info text
